#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define F first
#define S second
#define FRI freopen("in.txt","r",stdin)
#define FRO freopen("out.txt","w",stdout)
#define debug(args...) {dbg,args; cerr<<endl;}
#define EPS 1e-12
#define RAD(x) ((x*PI)/180)
#define MAXN 505
using namespace std;

const double PI=acos(-1.0);

struct debugger{
    template<typename T> debugger& operator , (const T& v){
        cerr<<v<<" ";
        return *this;
    }
}dbg;

int main() {
    int T,f,h,w,i,mini,cut[MAXN];
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--) {
        scanf("%d %d %d",&f,&h,&w);
        cut[0]=0;
        for(i=1;i<=f;i++) scanf("%d",&cut[i]);
        cut[i]=w;
        f+=2;
        sort(cut,cut+f);
        mini=w+1;
        for(i=1;i<f;i++) mini=min(mini,cut[i]-cut[i-1]);
        printf("%d\n",mini*h);
    }
    return 0;
}
